query: my screen is stuck like this. how to fix?
final_response:
Following are steps to fix steps to fix your laptop stuck on grey screen or infinite loading:

1. End all Discord processes to clear any stuck processes
2. Clear corrupted cache files to resolve startup issues
3. Run Discord with administrator privileges to bypass restrictions
4. Reset DNS settings to address network-related problems
5. Temporarily disable antivirus software or firewalls to identify if they are blocking Discord
6. Reinstall the application by downloading the latest version from the official Discord website
7. Launch the app to see if the problem is fixed
8. If the issue persists, consider using the web version of Discord at discord.com as a temporary solution
